title: How to Make Ramen Noodle Chicken Casserole

steps.headline: Prepare the ramen according to the package directions, leaving the seasoning on the side.
steps.description: Drain the noodles and place into a medium sized bowl.

steps.headline: Cook the chicken over medium heat until cooked thoroughly.
Add the chicken and cream of chicken soup to the bowl.
steps.description: Add the vegetables to the bowl. This could be anything from carrots, corn, peas, mushrooms, etc.

steps.headline: Stir mixture (optionally adding seasoning packet(s)) and add it to the pre-greased casserole dish.
Break up the bread slice into pieces and layer it onto the mixture.
Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 25 minutes or until the bread is browned.
Let cool for 5 minutes and serve.
steps.description: This dish goes well with a salad, steamed vegetables, or as a meal by itself.

text: Prepare the ramen according to the package directions, leaving the seasoning on the side. Drain the noodles and place into a medium sized bowl. Cook the chicken over medium heat until cooked thoroughly.  Add the chicken and cream of chicken soup to the bowl. Add the vegetables to the bowl. This could be anything from carrots, corn, peas, mushrooms, etc. Stir mixture (optionally adding seasoning packet(s)) and add it to the pre-greased casserole dish.  Break up the bread slice into pieces and layer it onto the mixture.  Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 25 minutes or until the bread is browned.  Let cool for 5 minutes and serve. This dish goes well with a salad, steamed vegetables, or as a meal by itself.
